FlowGraph
Table of Contents

Class FlowGraphLogger

Namespace
FlowGraph.Core.Diagnostics
Assembly
FlowGraph.Core.dll

Central static logger for FlowGraph diagnostics. Thread-safe and designed for high-performance logging with minimal overhead when disabled.

public static class FlowGraphLogger
Inheritance
object
FlowGraphLogger

Properties

EnabledCategories

Gets or sets the enabled categories. Only messages matching these categories are logged.

public static LogCategory EnabledCategories { get; set; }

Property Value

LogCategory

IsEnabled

Gets or sets whether logging is enabled globally. When disabled, all logging calls are no-ops with minimal overhead.

public static bool IsEnabled { get; set; }

Property Value

bool

MinimumLevel

Gets or sets the minimum log level. Messages below this level are ignored.

public static LogLevel MinimumLevel { get; set; }

Property Value

LogLevel

Sink

Gets the current log sink.

public static ILogSink Sink { get; }

Property Value

ILogSink

IsLevelEnabled(LogLevel, LogCategory)

Checks if a message at the given level and category would be logged. Use this to avoid expensive message formatting when logging is disabled.

public static bool IsLevelEnabled(LogLevel level, LogCategory category)
